categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Anok was a female Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. She sold gear to fellow Sith aboard Vaiken Spacedock. Anok wore red body armor.

Lord Anok appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, as the Operations Gear vendor for the Sith Inquisitor class. Her gear has changed frequently throughout the game's history, reflecting the current tier of gear. She was removed in Game Update 5.0 on November 29, 2016, which retired the PvP and PvE gear vendors in favor of the Command system.
